mapper.insert: insert into quality_gate_conditions (qgate_id, metric_id, operator, value_error, created_at, updated_at) values (#{qualityGateId}, #{metricId}, #{operator}, #{errorThreshold}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.sql: id, qgate_id as qualityGateId, metric_id as metricId, operator, value_error as errorThreshold, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt
mapper.delete: delete from quality_gate_conditions where not exists (select 1 from metrics m where m.enabled=${_true} and m.id = metric_id)
